scripts.build: npm run lint && tsc -b && vite build && mv dist/main.html dist/index.html && cp public/mframe.json mframe.json && npm run compile
scripts.build:windows: npm run lint && tsc -b && vite build && move dist\main.html dist\index.html && copy public\mframe.json mframe.json && npm run compile:windows
scripts.compile: cp dist/index.html index.html  && mtemplate compile && rm mframe.json index.html
scripts.compile:windows: copy dist\index.html  index.html  && mtemplate compile && del mframe.json index.html
